title: Typeface question?
content:
Sorry, Having to post type identification question here as the site is saying I have to login (even though I already have)when I am in type id forum,

Can anyone please identify the following typeface for me?

Thank you in advance

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [COMP2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104142513/http:/typophile.com/files/COMP2.jpg) | 38.32 KB |

 [‹ Verdigris](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104142513/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17571 "Go to previous forum topic") [Type Battle! Week 2 (23 Jan) ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104142513/http:/www.typophile.com/battle02 "Go to next forum topic")
author: christof8

comments.content:
Cool, thanks, did you know the typeface already,

What is the best way to identify a typeface apart from putting it into a basic category ie sans, serif, slab atc

Trying to learn how to identify a face but never know where to start

There’s so much out there you can’t learn it all methodically. Best way I know how is to study everything every major foundry has to offer, and then do the same as they release new stuff. You have to be a little obsessed to be really good at typeface identification.
